entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
